tool.name: singledishms
tool.shortdescription: New single dish tool interface to process an MS

method.name: singledishms
method.description: This is used to construct an {\tt singledishms} tool.
method.example:
Manual tool construction is done this way:
ssd = casac.singledishms()

method.name: open
method.shortdescription: Open a new MeasurementSet for processing after closing current MeasurementSet
method.description: Close the current MeasurementSet and open a new MeasurementSet instead. The current state of {\tt sdms} is retained, except for the data selection.

method.name: close
method.shortdescription: Close the {\tt sdms} tool, with data written on disk, keeping sdms running for future use
method.description: This is used to close {\tt sdms} tools. Note that the data is written to disk and detached from {\tt sdms} tool. This is a synonym for done.

method.name: done
method.description: This is used to close and {\tt sdms} tools. Note that the data is written to disk and detached from {\tt sdms} tool. This is a synonym for close.

method.name: name
method.shortdescription: Provide the name of the attached MeasurementSet
method.description: Returns the name of the attached MeasurementSet.

method.name: scale
method.shortdescription: Multiply a scaling factor to spectra
method.description: Multipy a scaling factor to selected spectra.

param.name: spw
param.description: Spectral Window Ids (0 relative) to select; -1 interpreted as all

param.name: field
param.description: Field Ids (0 relative) or Field names (msselection syntax and wilcards are used) to select

param.name: baseline
param.description: Antenna Ids (0 relative) or Antenna names (msselection syntax and wilcards are used) to select

param.name: time
param.description: Limit data selected to be within a given time range. Syntax is the defined in the msselection link

param.name: scan
param.description: Limit data selected on scan numbers. Syntax is the defined in the msselection link

param.name: observation
param.description: Select data by observation ID(s). The syntax is the same as for scan numbers.

param.name: beam
param.description: Beam Ids (0 relative) to select; CURRENTLY NOT AVAILABLE!!!

param.name: taql
param.description: For the TAQL experts, flexible data selection using the TAQL syntax
